info.title: Ethproofs API
info.description:
This document outlines the available API endpoints for Ethproofs.
    

**Base URL**
    

All API endpoints are relative to:
    

`https://staging--ethproofs.netlify.app/api/v0`
    

**Authentication**
    

All endpoints require authentication using an API key in the request header:
    

`Authorization: Bearer <api_key>`

get.description: Retrieve metadata for a specific block.

nickname.description: Human-readable name. Main display name in the UI

zkvm_version_id.description: ID of the zkVM version. Visit [ZKVMs](/docs/zkvms) to view all available zkVMs and their IDs.

proof_type.description: Proof system used to generate proofs. (e.g., Groth16 or PlonK)

network_between_machines.description: Network configuration details between machines in the cluster
network_between_machines.example: Dual-port 100GbE NICs in mesh topology with RDMA enabled, primary and backup interconnects between all nodes

machine.description: Physical hardware specifications of the machine

machine_count.description: Number of machines of this type

cloud_instance_name.description: The instance_name value of the cloud instance. Visit [Cloud Instances](/docs/cloud-instances) to view all available instances and their exact names.

get.description: Download a single proved proof by its proof ID.
Download all proved proofs for a specific block as a ZIP file.

200.description: ZIP file containing all proved proofs for the block

get.description: Retrieve a filtered and paginated list of proofs.

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: Filter by block number or block hash (0x-prefixed 64 hex characters)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of proofs to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of proofs to skip for pagination (default: 0)

post.description: The prover indicates they'll prove a block, but they haven't started proving yet.
The prover indicates they've started proving a block.
The prover indicates they've completed proving a block.

proving_time.description: Time in milliseconds taken to generate the proof including witness generation. It excludes time taken for data fetching and any latency to submit the proof.

proving_cycles.description: Number of cycles taken to generate the proof.

get.description: Returns a list of available cloud instances across different providers. Filter results by provider using the query parameter. See [Cloud Instances](/docs/cloud-instances) for a visual table view and more details.

post.description: Upload a verification key binary file to storage.

file.description: The verification key binary file to upload

filename.description: The filename to use for storage (e.g., 'team-vk.bin')

post.description: Upload a CSP benchmarks JSON file to storage.

file.description: The JSON file containing CSP benchmarks data

filename.description: The filename to use for storage (without .json extension)

400.description: No file or filename provided, or file is not JSON

apikey.description: Enter the token with the Bearer prefix, e.g. "Bearer <api_key>"
